    <style> .exem {color:blue; font-weight: bold} </style>

.. role:: exem

.. raw:: html

    <style> .solucao {font-weight: bold} </style>

.. role:: solucao

.. raw:: html

    <style> .blue {color:blue} </style>

.. role:: blue
